body:
sprockets-rails 2.x won't disable the default `public/` linking code path.

It should be pretty easy to defined a custom Helper method that raises instead of falling back to public linking. I don't plan on adding more `config.doeverything` options.

On Dec 10, 2012, at 9:06 AM, Rafael Mendonça França <notifications@github.com> wrote:

> I don't think we will include this kind of change in a stable release, but seems fine to master.
> 
> sprockets integration for master is on sprockets-rails gem now.
> 
> Before you start to work on it for sprockets-rails I want to get more feedback on this pull request.
> 
> cc/ @guilleiguaran @jeremy.
> 
> Mr. @josh, mind to give us your input?
